languages.text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Мастер-тактик{/g} и все его союзники, оружие которых позволяет совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаки по области{/g}, совершают атаки по области вместо одиночных атак во время Направленного шквала и Последнего рывка. Все союзники в этой области получают +35% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} мастера-тактика.

traits.locale_text: All allies, including the Tactician, that have a weapon capable of Area of Effect attacks, use Area of Effect attacks instead of a single strike to attack enemies as part of Directed Firestorm and Last Volley. All allies within the zone gain +35% Armour until the end of the Tactician's next turn.

All allies, including the Tactician, that have a weapon capable of Area of Effect attacks, use Area of Effect attacks instead of a single strike to attack enemies as part of Directed Firestorm and Last Volley. All allies within the zone gain +35% Armour until the end of the Tactician's next turn.

All allies, including the Tactician, that have a weapon capable of area of affect attacks use these area of fffect attacks instead of a single strike to attack enemies as part of Directed Firestorm and Last Volley. All allies within the zone gain +35% Armour until the end of the Tactician's next turn.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Мастер-тактик{/g} и все его союзники, оружие которых позволяет совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаки по области{/g}, совершают атаки по области вместо одиночных атак во время Направленного шквала и Последнего рывка. Все союзники в этой области получают +35% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} мастера-тактика.
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Тактик и все его союзники, оружие которых позволяет совершать атаки по области, совершают атаки по области вместо одиночных выстрелов во время Направленного шквала и Последнего рывка. Все союзники в этой области получают +35% к броне до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} тактика.

Тактик и все его союзники, оружие которых позволяет совершать атаки по области, совершают атаки по области вместо одиночных выстрелов во время Направленного шквала и Последнего рывка. Все союзники в этой области получают +35% к броне до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} тактика.

languages.text: 枪炮奏鸣与最终齐射期间，包括{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}在内，所有使用{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}武器的盟友，都可以使用范围攻击（而非单体攻击）来攻击敌人。区域内的所有盟友都会获得+35%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，效果持续至战术专家的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 定向焰暴与最终齐射期间，包括战术专家在内，所有使用{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}武器的盟友，都可以使用范围攻击（而非单体攻击）来攻击敌人。区域内的所有盟友都会获得+35%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，效果持续至战术专家的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。

languages.text: Todos los aliados (incluido el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g}) que tengan un arma capaz de efectuar {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} usarán estos ataques de área en vez de lanzar ataques individuales para atacar a sus enemigos como parte de Tormenta de fuego coordinada y Salva final. Todos los aliados situados en la zona ganan un +35 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del maestro táctico.
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Todos los aliados (incluido el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g}) que tengan un arma capaz de efectuar {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} usarán estos ataques de área en vez de golpear una sola vez para atacar a sus enemigos como parte de Tormenta de fuego dirigida y Salva final. Todos los aliados situados en la zona ganan un +35 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del maestro táctico.

languages.text: Sämtliche Verbündeten, einschließlich des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikers{/g}, die mit ihren Waffen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} ausführen können, nutzen als Teil von Geplanter Feuersturm und Letzte Salve diese Flächenangriffe anstatt eines Einzelangriffs. Alle Verbündeten innerhalb der Zone erhalten +35 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Meistertaktikers.
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Sämtliche Verbündeten, einschließlich des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikers{/g}, die mit ihren Waffen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} anstatt Einzelangriffe ausführen können, nutzen als Teil von Gezielter Feuersturm und Letzte Salve diese Flächenangriffe. Alle Verbündeten innerhalb der Zone erhalten +35 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Meistertaktikers.

languages.text: Tous les alliés, y compris le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g}, qui disposent d'une arme capable d'effectuer des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} utilisent ces attaques de zone plutôt qu'une attaque ponctuelle contre les ennemis dans le cadre de Tempête de Feu Dirigée et de Dernière Salve. Tous les alliés présents dans la zone bénéficient de +35 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du maître tacticien.
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tous les alliés, y compris le Tacticien, qui disposent d'une arme capable d'effectuer des attaques de zone utilisent ces {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} plutôt qu'une frappe ponctuelle pour attaquer les ennemis dans le cadre de Tempête de Feu Dirigée et de Dernière Salve. Tous les alliés présents dans la zone bénéficient de +35 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Tacticien.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}が可能な武器を持つ、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}を含む全ての味方は、うねるファイアストームと最後の斉射での攻撃時に、単発攻撃ではなく範囲攻撃を使用する。範囲内のすべての味方は、戦略の達人の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+35%される。
languages.original_text: All allies, including the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g}, that have a weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} use these area attacks instead of a single attack against enemies as part of Orchestrated Firestorm and Last Volley. All allies within the zone gain +35% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}が可能な武器を持つ、戦術家を含む全ての味方は、炎嵐の指揮と最後の斉射での攻撃時に、単発射撃ではなく範囲攻撃を使用する。範囲内のすべての味方は、戦術家の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+35%される。
